---
title: JuliaCon Proceedings Template
---

The [quarto-juliacon-proceedings](https://github.com/pat-alt/quarto-juliacon-proceedings) extension adds support for writing a JuliaCon Proceedings article in Quarto. The rendered versions of the template are shown below. To open the different version in full screen instead use the following links: [HTML](https://www.patalt.org/quarto-juliacon-proceedings/template.html){target="_blank"} | [PDF](https://www.patalt.org/quarto-juliacon-proceedings/template.pdf){target="_blank"}.

## PDF

```{=html}
<iframe style="border:2px solid red;" width="800" height="500" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" src="https://www.patalt.org/quarto-juliacon-proceedings/template.pdf"></iframe>
```

## HTML

```{=html}
<iframe style="border:2px solid red;" width="800" height="500" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" src="https://www.patalt.org/quarto-juliacon-proceedings/template.html"></iframe>
```
